column5: My hotmail is all reconfigured and it won't really let me get my mail.  Anyone else having issues at all?  Is there a fix?
just checked mine...its working fine here.
Are you using Windows LIVE? or just regular hotmail? (via website)?  EDIT: I'm not having any problems.
It is trying to go windows live
It is working now. thanks. sorry for the panic

Just as a warning I had Hotmail for several years and one day, GONE.....all gone......I had nothing in any of my mail boxes.....my son told me to go to Gmail and after that I finally listened. MUCH better than Hotmail in EVERY respect, especially SPAM filters not to mention storage size.  Bob
